projects.title: AI Code Assistant
projects.description: An intelligent code completion tool powered by machine learning, helping developers write better code faster.
projects.longDescription: This AI-powered code assistant helps developers by providing smart code completions, identifying potential bugs, and suggesting best practices. Built with state-of-the-art machine learning models.

projects.title: DevSpace
projects.description: A modern collaboration platform for remote development teams with real-time features.
projects.longDescription: DevSpace enables seamless collaboration for remote development teams with features like real-time code sharing, video calls, and project management tools.

projects.title: Neural Vision
projects.description: Advanced computer vision platform for real-time object detection and image analysis.

projects.title: CloudMaster
projects.description: Infrastructure as code platform with automated deployment and monitoring.

projects.title: SwiftUI Animations
projects.description: A comprehensive library of beautiful animations for iOS applications.
